name: part_003
file: tmp_異次元フェス開催記念音楽番組　MUSIC BIGBANG！ [wUQ61OVMU2A]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of 'Wandering Dream Chaser' by Mayuzumi Fuyuko and La+ Darknesss.
Transition sequence featuring the logos of Love Live!, Nijisanji, and the team name 'Yohadora'.
Performance of 'Red Ruler' by Tsushima Yoshiko, covering a song by Dora.

subtitles.original: 胸に　渡る夢を　この手でつかむの
subtitles.english: I'll grasp the dream passing through my heart with these hands.

subtitles.original: 諦めない、絶対
subtitles.english: I won't give up, never.

subtitles.original: 高く高い壁だって　Get Chance & Luck　飛び越え
subtitles.english: Even the highest walls, Get Chance & Luck, I'll leap over them.

subtitles.original: 異彩の光で魅せるわ
subtitles.english: I'll enchant you with a brilliant light.

subtitles.original: 憧れはいつの日か　Grow up & Change　突き抜け
subtitles.english: One day, my longing will Grow up & Change, breaking through.

subtitles.original: 私たちが目指すGoalへ導く(Dance with the shine)
subtitles.english: Leading to the Goal we aim for (Dance with the shine).

subtitles.original: Day after day　彷徨っても　辿り着く
subtitles.english: Day after day, even if I wander, I will arrive.

subtitles.original: 高鳴る鼓動が鳴り響いてる
subtitles.english: My racing heartbeat is echoing.

subtitles.original: Wandering Dream Chaser
subtitles.english: Wandering Dream Chaser

subtitles.original: 時代を巻き込むくらい　ほとばしるCrazy
subtitles.english: Gushing out Crazy enough to engulf the era.

subtitles.original: 強引なNaked heart　さらけ出すよ
subtitles.english: I'll lay bare my pushy Naked heart.

subtitles.original: 中途半端じゃなくて　思いのままに暴れたい
subtitles.english: Not halfway, I want to go wild as I please.

subtitles.original: 失うものがあっても　We'll be alright
subtitles.english: Even if there's something to lose, We'll be alright.

subtitles.original: 歪んだ光だって(Bright!)
subtitles.english: Even distorted light (Bright!)

subtitles.original: 重なり研ぎ澄まされ(Be one!)
subtitles.english: Overlapping and being sharpened (Be one!)

subtitles.original: 未来　照らしだせる　チカラになるから
subtitles.english: Because it will become the power to illuminate the future.

subtitles.original: 永く長い道だって　Don't stop & back　駆け抜け
subtitles.english: Even on the longest road, Don't stop & back, I'll run through.

subtitles.original: 新たな世界を拓くよ
subtitles.english: I'll open up a new world.

subtitles.original: 思いを重ねるほど　Heat up & Chain　輝き
subtitles.english: The more our feelings overlap, Heat up & Chain, the more we'll shine.

subtitles.original: 私たちのスピード上げていくから (Step up my heart)
subtitles.english: We're going to pick up our speed (Step up my heart).

subtitles.original: We just trying　変えていく　変わってく
subtitles.english: We just trying, changing it, it's changing.

subtitles.original: 描いた理想を叶えていく
subtitles.english: Fulfilling the ideals we've drawn.

subtitles.original: Wandering Dream Chaser
subtitles.english: Wandering Dream Chaser

subtitles.original: 際限の無い厄災にさえ 黄金を踏み散らすのは誰
subtitles.english: Who is it that tramples over gold, even in the midst of boundless calamity?

subtitles.original: 揺れる黒の狂鳴と　禍つ闇のサイレンと
subtitles.english: With the swaying black screams, and the sirens of calamity's darkness.

subtitles.original: Ruleを聞かないblood エンドバッドさ 暴力 ＂ニンゲン＂をかたる魔獣の声
subtitles.english: Blood that doesn't listen to the Rule, it's an end-bad, violent voice of a beast masquerading as a 'human'.

subtitles.original: 宝ヲ奪ウ者達のcall　焔ト荒ラス者達のgrowl
subtitles.english: The call of those who steal treasures, the growl of those who ravage with flames.

subtitles.original: Ruleを知らないblood エンドバッドさ 暴力 黄金を踏み散らす奴は誰！
subtitles.english: Blood that knows no Rule, it's an end-bad, violence; who is the one trampling over the gold!

subtitles.original: 終末を嗤う絶望も
subtitles.english: Even the despair that laughs at the end.

subtitles.original: 明日を見据えるReloadも 一喰らう覚悟はあるか？
subtitles.english: And the Reload looking towards tomorrow, are you prepared to devour it all?

subtitles.original: 有るのは虹の夢 或いは紅き翅
subtitles.english: There's the rainbow dream, or the crimson wings.

subtitles.original: はじめようか
subtitles.english: Shall we begin?

subtitles.original: the 咆哮！ wo wo wo
subtitles.english: The Roar! wo wo wo

subtitles.original: 燃やしてやろうじゃないか 有象無象 全て
subtitles.english: Why don't we burn it all down, every single bit of the rabble.

subtitles.original: wo wo wo
subtitles.english: wo wo wo

subtitles.original: 研ぎ澄まされた理不尽さえ 呑み込んで
subtitles.english: Devouring even the sharpened irrationality.

subtitles.original: 傷ついたって 壊れたって 護りたい “共火”がある世界！ 上等 サァ
subtitles.english: Even if I get hurt, even if I break, I want to protect the world where the 'shared flame' exists! Bring it on, now.

subtitles.original: 今夜も熱くやろうじゃないか 灼熱ノRed Ruler
subtitles.english: Let's do it passionately again tonight, the scorching Red Ruler.
